products.name: White Quinoa
products.description: Discover our Andean quinoa, sustainably sourced from Puno or Ayacucho, rich in protein, essential amino acids, and micronutrients. Meeting strict quality standards, it's offered in organic and conventional varieties, ideal for various culinary needs.

products.name: Red Quinoa
products.description: Discover our gluten-free ancient grain, Red quinoa. Sourced from premium farms.

products.name: Black Quinoa
products.description: Discover our gluten-free ancient grain, Black quinoa. Sourced from premium farms.

products.name: Tri-color Quinoa
products.description: Discover our gluten-free ancient grain, Tricolor quinoa. Sourced from premium farms.

products.name: Black Chia Seeds
products.description: Explore our Central American chia, packed with omega-3s, fiber, antioxidants, and proteins. Available in organic and conventional varieties, cultivated with care to meet high standards. Rest assured, each batch maintains purity and freshness, ensuring exceptional quality for your products.

products.name: Amaranth
products.description: Experience our amaranth, an ancient grain originating from Central and South America, rich in proteins, fiber, vitamins, and minerals. Cultivated with the highest standards of quality and sustainability, our amaranth ensures freshness and purity in every grain. Perfect for today's healthy market.

products.name: Large Lima Beans
products.description: Our well known Large Limas also known as butter beans, are prized for their smooth texture and delicate flavor. Their starchy yet creamy texture imparts a subtle taste that complements a wide array of dishes. Sourced from the fertile soils of the Peruvian Andes and cultivated to the highest quality standards, our butter beans are a versatile and delicious choice to enhance your favorite recipes.

products.name: Baby Lima Beans
products.description: Peruvian Baby Lima Beans, from northern Peru, offer a unique flavor and tender texture, making them stand out. They hold great potential as a sought-after export, adding a premium touch to various international dishes with their versatility and delicate profile.

products.name: Black Eye Beans
products.description: Introducing our Black Eyed Beans from northern Peru. Renowned for their buttery texture and delicate flavor, these beans are ideal for global cuisines. Rich in protein, fiber, and essential nutrients, they elevate any dish.

products.name: Peeled Mung Beans
products.description: Peeled mung beans are small, yellow legumes known for their mild flavor and high nutritional value. They are rich in protein, fiber, and essential vitamins, making them a versatile ingredient in soups, salads, and various dishes. Easy to cook and digest, peeled mung beans are a healthy addition to any diet.

products.name: Green Mung Beans
products.description: The Mung Bean is renowned for its small, oval seeds rich in protein, fiber, and nutrients. It is used in various culinary forms such as mung bean sprouts, dried beans, and flour. Recognized for its versatility and nutritional value, it is a staple ingredient in many cuisines and a significant source of food in several regions worldwide.

products.name: Adzuki Beans
products.description: Its seeds typically exhibit a vibrant, uniform red hue. Renowned for its sweet flavor, kidney beans are used in various cuisines, particularly in pastry making where they are commonly processed into a paste.
